infotexts.jobdescription.Pilot: Elite Soldiers of the Iron League, Iron Riders serve as stalwart defenders of humanity on Europa.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualitypistol: Pistols you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.bountyhunterbw: When using a pistol or iron fist,causes additional [probability]% damage and [armorpenetration]% armor penetration.
infotexts.talentdescription.quickdrawbw: Every [seconds] seconds,the damage caused by the next Power Combat System damage will become [damage] times.
infotexts.talentdescription.tumblebw: Your pistol and iron fist damage increase [damage]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.trustbuildingbw: Every time you complete a task, you increase [smallgain]% of your maximum life. If all crew members survive, increase the maximum life of [largegain]%, up to [maxgain]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.enforcerbw: When attacking with a shotgun,causes additional [damage]% damage and [armorpenetration]% armor penetration.
infotexts.talentdescription.steelruler: When driving a mech,attack power increased [value]%,[stattype] increased [amount]%,damage taken reduced [value]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.chanceofextraweapondam: When using weapons,additional [probability]% damage and [armorpenetration]% armor penetration are caused.
infotexts.talentdescription.laststand: When your life is lower than [health]%, you will quickly restore your health.
infotexts.talentdescription.deadeyebw: When you launch an Experimental Precise Gun,damage increases [powerincrease]%.You can also recover from bleeding faster.Whenever you complete a task,get the following supplies.
infotexts.talentdescription.stonewallbw: When you are attacked,within [seconds] your physical damage resistance increases [physicaldamagereduction]%,stun resistance increases [stunresistance]%,and melee damage increases [amount]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.gunsmithbw: Item you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.chanceofextraweapondam: When attacking with a CQB SMG or Power Axe,[probability]% probability will cause double damage and [amount]% more armor penetration.
infotexts.talentdescription.optimizedpowerflowbw: Turret energy consumption and charging speed reduce your electrical skills by [statamount]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualitylaserb: The quality of the energy weapons you make is improved [qualitybonus].
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualityhmgbw: The quality of the machine gun weapons you make is improved [qualitybonus].
infotexts.entitydescription.PFbw: All Iron League recruits are trained in hand-to-hand combat.
infotexts.entitydescription.stunbatonbw: Heat Sabers are an effective stun weapon when charged with an X01 Oxygen Cell, but are notoriously ineffective against armor.
infotexts.entitydescription.hammer_bw: A dense boarding hammer. It can be loaded with a shaped charge for more penetration power. Largely ineffective in combat.
infotexts.entitydescription.uex2: A shaped charge for use with the Thunder Hammer. Great care must be taken to avoid injury.
infotexts.entitydescription.bw_axe: A slower but safer alternative to the Thunder Hammer for breaching submarines, this cumbersome and unwieldy axe is frighteningly effective against armor.
infotexts.entitydescription.bwgs: A longsword of ancient design. Its heavy blade serves exceptionally well against armor.
infotexts.entitydescription.tachi: A curved blade of exotic design. Its swift blade struggles against armor, but excels when meeting flesh.
infotexts.entitydescription.corsairar_bw: An old and outdate suit of military armor suit. It still sees limited service with novice Iron Riders and Iron Rebels, who use it to raid cargo ships. Made to run off of Oxygen Tanks albeit not very efficiently.
infotexts.entitydescription.armored_miningsuit_bw: Heavy mining armor suit design for high-pressure environment.Used power cycle design to work using fulgurium batteries.Can install extra hammer container.
infotexts.entitydescription.toolbox_bw: Thick container can transfer dangerous small goods and ores safely.
infotexts.entitydescription.armored_hardsuit_bw: A heavy suit of modern battle armor that offers great protection without hampering mobility. It has an attached universal holster to hold one weapon. It is the main issued suit to Iron Riders who don't need specialized protection. Requires an X01 Oxygen Cell for optimal performance.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygen_cell_bw: The mainstay of Iron League technology is the X01 Oxygen Cell. It utilizes a mix of high-capacity fulgurium batteries with a cutting edge oxygen and pressure system using oxygenite forming a Powercell able power battle armor while also providing breathable air to the occupants. While they've been designed to be quite resistant to puncture and heat, they're certainly not invulnerable.
infotexts.entitydescription.armored_hardsuit_bwl: An adorned suit of armor for squad commanders and other veteran officers, the X01 Commander Armor is largely the same as the standard X01 Battle Armor, except that this suit possesses improved communication and sensor system to aid in squad navigation and target tracking. It also serves to serve as a subtle training method for newer Iron Riders, as losing contact with the squad commander usually leads to immediate disorientation.
infotexts.entitydescription.armored_hardsuit_bw2: A highly adorned and venerated suit of Battle Armor. Each suit of veteran armor is personalized to the wearer through trinkets, engravings, and personal upgrades. It is slightly more robust than standard battle armor through small upgrades, though these small tweaks don't amount to much. The key difference that this suit possesses over others is its built thermal vision.
infotexts.entitydescription.knight_hardsuit_bw: A mysterious suit of poorly understood armor that was put together in secret by rogue Iron League scientists using poorly understood alien materials found within the alien ruins. It feels almost alive at first touch. Linking deeply to the wearers body while worn, the suit seems to allow for some light resistance to the various toxins and parasites found hidden in the deep of Europa's waters. It requies a rare power cell made from alien power cells and other exotic materials to run properly. Don't let the battery run dry...
infotexts.entitydescription.pio_bw: While the Pioneer is an excellent suit of armor for those tasked jobs in dangerous regions of Europa and active combat zones the standart pioneer suit featured not enough armor. Due to frequent complaints and casualties among those the creation of the Pioneer Custom suit of armor was ordered which incorporates extra protection against the dangers of Combat but has become more bulky and less agile because of it. Made to run off of Oxygen Tanks albeit not very efficiently.
infotexts.entitydescription.pio_bw2: The Pioneer series of Armor suits was designed to help Iron League engineers with their various tasks on Europa. Unlike most Iron League suits, its systems help with more efficient repair, maintenance and construction of bases and submarines while also offering better protection from the dangers associated with those tasks than normal diving suits and even allows the use of the same Oxygen Tanks.
infotexts.entitydescription.armored_miningsuit_bw2: The Hercules is designed to work as a heavy weapons platform. To this extent it is heavy, slow, and incredibly protective. However, the armor is incredibly clausterphobic and its poor mobility is hampered even further by water. However, it's bulk does serve to absorb the recoil of even the heaviest Iron League weapons. The Hercules comes with a small crane arm and a small amount of armored internal storage to assist with ammunition management. Requies an X01 Oxygen Cell for optimal performance.
infotexts.entitydescription.corsairar_bp: Experimental prototype with extremely high attack performance.Use X01 oxygen cell.
infotexts.entitydescription.armored_miningsuit_bw3: The Hercules is an excellent weapon platform, but the sluggish nature of the armor meant that anyone who wielded it was often simply outmaneuvered by lighter forces. Thus a new iteration on the armor was developed, removing all of the intneral ammo storage and loading assistance in exchange for a more powerful movement system. It's still incredibly slow, but you will at least be able to reach the end of the hallway before the day is done. Requires an X01 Oxygen Cell for optimal performance.
infotexts.entitydescription.rgcbw: Can load 4 railgun shell or thunder cannon.
infotexts.entitydescription.plasmacutterbw: Advanced cutting tools,also good to cut flesh.
infotexts.entitydescription.bwpower: Can power up alien power cell.
infotexts.entitydescription.ancientweaponbw: Powerful energy weapon.Attack mode depend on which kind of alien power cell it uses.
infotexts.entitydescription.cell_bw: The power battery combined with Alien Technology can provide unlimited power for hammerhead,corsair, and pioneer armor.
infotexts.entitydescription.jetscooterbw: Heavy engine for auxiliary heavy mech.
infotexts.entitydescription.divingknifebw: Small single-molecule blade,can actually cause damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.rg_bw: Forcibly converted into a portable main gun,has many shortcomings.Use railgun shells other than nuclear shell.
infotexts.entitydescription.HMG1_bw: Heavy rapid-fire weapon,but need cooldown after barrage.Fire 14.5mm rounds.
infotexts.entitydescription.minichaingun_bw: Heavy weapon,but very expensive.Use experimental chaingun ammo box.
infotexts.entitydescription.lasercannon_bw: Heavily armed laser weapon,can melt both flesh and metal.Good at against door than structure.Required X01 Oxygen Cell.
infotexts.entitydescription.explosivespearbw: Single used weapon,go for a hard punch.
infotexts.entitydescription.esg_bw: Heavy gun developed for coalition special operations,fires precise bullet.
infotexts.entitydescription.esg_bw2: Improved heavy gun,aiming faster.Use precise bullet.
infotexts.entitydescription.lasercannon_bp3: Modified laser cannon with a compact frame,has the defect of being prone to overheating.
infotexts.entitydescription.lmgmagazine_bw2: Living metal provide limitless rounds,but halfed the damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.lmg_bw: A reliable auto-fire weapon,can deal massive damage to soft target.Use linked 7.62mm magazine.
infotexts.entitydescription.battlecannon_bw: Heavy cannon fires HE rockets,use rocket shell.
infotexts.entitydescription.cannonshell_bw: Storm the line.Deal good burn damage on impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.prg_bw: Heavy shoulder-fired launcher developed for coalition special operations, unwieldy and expensive but packs a punch.
infotexts.entitydescription.prg_ammo: Dumbfire railgun with an armor piercing warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.grenadelauncher_bw: Coalition auto gun.Can fire 25mm grenade or shotgun shell.
infotexts.entitydescription.smg_bw: Fast auto-fire weapon,can be dual wielded.Use 7.62mm magazine.
Living metal provide limitless rounds,but halfed the damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.shellbagbw: Infantry support bag design for boarding battle,can not take high water pressure.X01 oxygen cell can active underwater oxygen supply system.
infotexts.entitydescription.shellshieldbw: Powered combat infantry armor design for protect high rank officers,slow but as solid as a rock.X01 oxygen cell can active underwater oxygen supply system.
infotexts.entitydescription.ballistichelmetbw: A symbol of footman.Can not salvage.
infotexts.entitydescription.captainscapbw: A symbol of leadership.Can not salvage.
infotexts.entitydescription.weldingtoolbw: Smart system can avoid to damage biological,use batterycell,fulguriumbatterycell,or X01 oxygen cell.
infotexts.entitydescription.captainsuniformbw: A symbol of loyalty.Can not salvage.
infotexts.entitydescription.tatical_scanner: Tactical Scanner not only show for situation,but also can inject medicine to save your life.
infotexts.entitydescription.revolver_bw: Old-fashioned weapon,can be dual wielded.Use 14.5mm round.
infotexts.entitydescription.bandolierbw2: Symbol of courage,increase melee attack speed.Cannot be disassembled.
infotexts.entitydescription.bandolierbw3: Symbol of courage,increase defense power.Cannot be disassembled.
infotexts.entitydescription.bandolierbw4: Symbol of courage,increase melee attack speed and defense power.Cannot be disassembled.
infotexts.entitydescription.bandolierbw: A symbol of courage,increase range weapons attack speed.Cannot be disassembled.
infotexts.entitydescription.bandolierbw2: A symbol of courage,increases attack speed of range and melee weapons.Cannot be disassembled.
infotexts.entitydescription.bandolierbw3: Symbol of courage, increasing defense power and attack speed of range weapons.Cannot be disassembled.
infotexts.entitydescription.bandolierbw4: A symbol of courage,strengthens the attack speed and defense of range and melee weapons.Cannot be disassembled.
infotexts.entitydescription.handcannonbw: This large-caliber handcannon is full of intimidation.
infotexts.Afflictiondescription.architect2: Repair speed increased 25%,health increased 50%,very slowly repairs itself.
infotexts.Afflictiondescription.X01: Damage increased by 10%,health increased by 25%,very slowly repairs itself.
infotexts.Afflictiondescription.DEFbw: Increases health 50% and physical damage resistance increased 30%.
infotexts.Afflictiondescription.DEFbw2: Increases health 25% and physical damage resistance increased 15%.
infotexts.Afflictiondescription.sup3: Attack speed increased 20%,health increased 25%,physical damage resistance increased 15%.
